faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.checkIn: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.checkInAnswer: Check-in is available from 3:00 PM, and check-out is until 11:00 AM. If you need an earlier check-in or later check-out, please contact the reception - if possible, we will try to accommodate your needs.
faq.petsAnswer: Yes, we accept pets in selected cabins for an additional fee of 50 PLN per stay. Please inform us in advance about your intention to arrive with a pet.
faq.financial: Do you offer financial advice related to cabin rentals?
faq.financialAnswer: Yes, our owner Iza is an expert in real estate finance and law. We offer consultations on financial and legal aspects of short and long-term rentals, as well as advice on investing in holiday properties. More information can be obtained by contacting us directly.
faq.attractions: What attractions are in the area?
faq.attractionsAnswer: There are many attractions in the area, including lakes with beaches and water sports facilities, hiking and biking trails, architectural monuments, and local restaurants serving regional dishes. Maps and brochures with complete information about nearby attractions are available at the reception.
